rule.ruleDesc: Run JavaScript to active dependency task for current task record.
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.mode">$L.mode</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">add</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentWFPhase</TableName><FieldName caption="Active">active</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Run JavaScript to active dependency task for current task record. (when ( $L.mode = "add" OR Active in CurrentWFPhase != true))
